__e: Tell you, man, being with her just -- it reminds me of everything that's simple and good in the world.
yeah,when you overthink simple things so much that you can't do them at all.
Because I ask you to do simple things, and even those, you don't...
I do miss the simple things at home.
That the sacred is in the ordinary, The common things in life.
If the killer only wanted to scare people, there are far simpler ways to do that.
We were more than friends, and I asked you if you killed him.
But I'm starting to wonder if we can ever really just be friends.
You seem like... you seem like a nice man, but I really think we would be better off as just friends.
Right, but these guys are still just foot soldiers.
All right, so we need to be more than warriors.
There are no privates any more.
So why don't you go back to playing God and let the rest of us mere mortals get back to business.
That may not mean much to you people... but to us mere mortals in the State Department, that's a serious issue.
It's something we mere mortals have to do from time to time.
Things are not that simple for me.
Just a little reminder of when things were simpler for us, the way we used to be.
That does make it easier for everyone else, doesn't it?
